title: PBE
body: I applied for a PBE account last year and still don't have one and my friend told me he got his in less than a month. My question is why cant i get my PBE account if my friend got it in less than a month?

replies.body: PBE is like the lottery and who gets in is pretty much random so someone can get in quicker than you, while others have to wait forever.

PBE testers are sent invites in waves, and we choose them on criteria that change pretty frequently. We don't send out invites on a first-come-first-served basis.  We typically look for players who are a positive force in the community and are really active in the game. You can see our complete breakdown of the PBE in our [FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top)

Let me know if you have any questions.
ok, thank you for the info
